transcript: and so people think in winners and losers but what they really are are just players and quitters the biggest games in life are infinite games where the point isn't to get in shape but to stay in shape the point isn't to get married but to stay married the point isn't to get in business but to stay in business and so as long as you're playing you're winning and so if you've done all these things cool just don't be a quitter and just continue because the thing is is I promise that with enough action over a long period of time you will find success it's just the people who run out of will or resources to continue
